code: import React from'react';import{Check,Clock,Archive,BarChart2}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ContractsCountTracker=_ref=>{let{contracts}=_ref;const activeContracts=contracts.filter(contract=>contract.status==='Active').length;const upcomingContracts=contracts.filter(contract=>contract.status==='Pending').length;const completedContracts=contracts.filter(contract=>contract.status==='Completed').length;const CountCard=_ref2=>{let{icon:Icon,title,count,color}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center p-4 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-3 rounded-full ".concat(color.replace('text-','bg-')," bg-opacity-10 mb-4"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{className:"".concat(color," w-8 h-8")})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm font-medium text-gray-500",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold ".concat(color),children:count})]})]});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-full bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md p-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CountCard,{icon:Check,title:"Active",count:activeContracts,color:"text-green-500"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CountCard,{icon:Clock,title:"Upcoming",count:upcomingContracts,color:"text-yellow-500"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CountCard,{icon:Archive,title:"Completed",count:completedContracts,color:"text-blue-500"})]})});};export default ContractsCountTracker;
